meanings.definition: The practice of marrying within one's own social group, tribe, or clan.
meanings.sent1: Endogamies can help maintain traditions within a community.

meanings.sent4: Her commitment to endogamies was as strong as the roots of an ancient tree.
meanings.sent5: The endogamies of the past shaped the future of the tribe.
